name: The Centrelink Game
description:
Exhibited at Bar SK Game-a-week 'Side A' (2/11/17 - 8/11/17), The Centrelink Game is a short satirical game about the Australian welfare system made as part of a Game a Week challenge under the theme 'Ritual'. 

All you have to do is call Centrelink. Easy right? 

There's a few chores you can do while waiting around the house, but this is a game about waiting. This game is designed to be played on the side while you do other things. Good luck!
